verses.verse: וְאָ֣הַבְתָּ֔ <S%H157><s%> Therefore thou shalt love אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H8104><s%> and keep מִשְׁמַרְתּ֗וֹ <S%H4931><s%> his charge וְחֻקֹּתָ֧יו <S%H2708><s%> and his statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֛יו <S%H4941><s%> and his judgments וּמִצְוֹתָ֖יו <S%H4687><s%> and his commandments כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> alway

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֮ <S%H3045><s%> And know הַיּוֹם֒ <S%H3117><s%> ye this day כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for בְּנֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H1121><s%> for [I speak] not with your children אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not יָדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> which have not known וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> and who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not רָא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> and which have not seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוּסַ֖ר <S%H4148><s%> the chastisement יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גָּדְל֕וֹ <S%H1433><s%> his greatness אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> hand הַחֲזָקָ֔ה <S%H2389><s%> his mighty וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <S%H2220><s%> arm הַנְּטוּיָֽה׃ <S%H5186><s%> and his stretched out

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹֽתֹתָיו֙ <S%H226><s%> And his miracles וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשָׂ֔יו <S%H4639><s%> and his acts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> which he did בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְפַרְעֹ֥ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> and unto all his land

וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> and what עָשָׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> And what he did לְחֵ֨יל <S%H2428><s%> unto the army מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְסוּסָ֣יו <S%H5483><s%> unto their horses וּלְרִכְבּ֗וֹ <S%H7393><s%> and to their chariots אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> when הֵצִ֜יף <S%H6687><s%> to overflow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵ֤י <S%H4325><s%> how he made the water יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea סוּף֙ <S%H5488><s%> of the Red עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> them בְּרָדְפָ֖ם <S%H7291><s%> as they pursued אַחֲרֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> after וַיְאַבְּדֵ֣ם <S%H6><s%> hath destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> you and [how] the LORD עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> this הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> them unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> he

וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and what עָשָׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> And what he did לָכֶ֖ם בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> unto you in the wilderness עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּאֲכֶ֖ם <S%H935><s%> until ye came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> into this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> and what עָשָׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> And what he did לְדָתָ֣ן <S%H1885><s%> unto Dathan וְלַאֲבִירָ֗ם <S%H48><s%> and Abiram בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אֱלִיאָב֮ <S%H446><s%> of Eliab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רְאוּבֵן֒ <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> and what פָּצְתָ֤ה <S%H6475><s%> opened הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> how the earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֔יהָ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth וַתִּבְלָעֵ֥ם <S%H1104><s%> and swallowed them up וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּתֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> and their households וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H168><s%> and their tents וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הַיְקוּם֙ <S%H3351><s%> and all the substance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> and what בְּרַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7272><s%> that [was] in their possession בְּקֶ֖רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of all Israel

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> But your eyes הָֽרֹאֹ֔ת <S%H7200><s%> have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> acts יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַגָּדֹ֑ל <S%H1419><s%> all the great אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> which he did

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H8104><s%> Therefore shall ye keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <S%H4687><s%> all the commandments אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> you this day לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> so תֶּחֶזְק֗וּ <S%H2388><s%> that ye may be strong וּבָאתֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> and go in וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <S%H3423><s%> and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <S%H5674><s%> whither ye go שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to possess

וּלְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תַּאֲרִ֤יכוּ <S%H748><s%> And that ye may prolong יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> [your] days עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <S%H7650><s%> sware יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H1><s%> unto your fathers לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָהֶ֖ם וּלְזַרְעָ֑ם <S%H2233><s%> unto them and to their seed אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> and honey ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> For the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you בָא־ <S%H935><s%> whither thou goest in שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <S%H3423><s%> to possess לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> like כְאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it [is] not as the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יְצָאתֶ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> from whence ye came out מִשָּׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> in it אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> where תִּזְרַע֙ <S%H2232><s%> where thou sowedst אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed וְהִשְׁקִ֥יתָ <S%H8248><s%> and wateredst בְרַגְלְךָ֖ <S%H7272><s%> [it] with thy foot כְּגַ֥ן <S%H1588><s%> as a garden הַיָּרָֽק׃ <S%H3419><s%> of herbs

וְהָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> But the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֜ם <S%H859><s%> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> abide שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <S%H3423><s%> to possess אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it [is] a land הָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> of hills וּבְקָעֹ֑ת <S%H1237><s%> and valleys לִמְטַ֥ר <S%H4306><s%> of the rain הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven תִּשְׁתֶּה־ <S%H8354><s%> [and] drinketh מָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water

אֶ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> A land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God דֹּרֵ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> careth for אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> תָּמִ֗יד <S%H8548><s%> [are] always עֵינֵ֨י <S%H5869><s%> the eyes יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God בָּ֔הּ מֵֽרֵשִׁית֙ <S%H7225><s%> upon it from the beginning הַשָּׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> of the year וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> even אַחֲרִ֥ית <S%H319><s%> even unto the end שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> of the year ס

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if שָׁמֹ֤עַ <S%H8085><s%> And it shall come to pass if ye shall hearken תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> diligently אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִצְוֹתַ֔י <S%H4687><s%> unto my commandments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> which I command אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> you this day לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <S%H157><s%> to love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> your God וּלְעָבְד֔וֹ <S%H5647><s%> and to serve בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> him with all your heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H5315><s%> and with all your soul

וְנָתַתִּ֧י <S%H5414><s%> That I will give מְטַֽר־ <S%H4306><s%> [you] the rain אַרְצְכֶ֛ם <S%H776><s%> of your land בְּעִתּ֖וֹ <S%H6256><s%> in his due season יוֹרֶ֣ה <S%H3138><s%> the first rain וּמַלְק֑וֹשׁ <S%H4456><s%> and the latter rain וְאָסַפְתָּ֣ <S%H622><s%> that thou mayest gather דְגָנֶ֔ךָ <S%H1715><s%> in thy corn וְתִֽירֹשְׁךָ֖ <S%H8492><s%> and thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3323><s%> and thine oil

וְנָתַתִּ֛י <S%H5414><s%> And I will send עֵ֥שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> grass בְּשָׂדְךָ֖ <S%H7704><s%> in thy fields לִבְהֶמְתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H929><s%> for thy cattle וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <S%H398><s%> that thou mayest eat וְשָׂבָֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H7646><s%> and be full

הִשָּֽׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> Take heed לָכֶ֔ם פֶּ֥ן <S%H6435><s%> are not יִפְתֶּ֖ה <S%H6601><s%> be not deceived לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <S%H3824><s%> to yourselves that your heart וְסַרְתֶּ֗ם <S%H5493><s%> and ye turn aside וַעֲבַדְתֶּם֙ <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <S%H7812><s%> and worship לָהֶֽם׃

וְחָרָ֨ה <S%H2734><s%> be kindled אַף־ <S%H639><s%> wrath יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And [then] the LORD'S בָּכֶ֗ם וְעָצַ֤ר <S%H6113><s%> against you and he shut up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> the heaven וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become מָטָ֔ר <S%H4306><s%> that there be no rain וְהָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> and that the land לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will be no תִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> yield אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְבוּלָ֑הּ <S%H2981><s%> not her fruit וַאֲבַדְתֶּ֣ם <S%H6><s%> and [lest] ye perish מְהֵרָ֗ה <S%H4120><s%> quickly מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַטֹּבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> from off the good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָכֶֽם׃

וְשַׂמְתֶּם֙ <S%H7760><s%> Therefore shall ye lay up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרַ֣י <S%H1697><s%> these my words אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> in your heart וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> and in your soul וּקְשַׁרְתֶּ֨ם <S%H7194><s%> and bind אֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> לְאוֹת֙ <S%H226><s%> them for a sign עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יֶדְכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> upon your hand וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall be as לְטוֹטָפֹ֖ת <S%H2903><s%> that they may be as frontlets בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between עֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> between your eyes

וְלִמַּדְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3925><s%> And ye shall teach אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> them your children לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> speaking בָּ֑ם בְּשִׁבְתְּךָ֤ <S%H3427><s%> of them when thou sittest בְּבֵיתֶ֙ךָ֙ <S%H1004><s%> in thine house וּבְלֶכְתְּךָ֣ <S%H1980><s%> walk בַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way וּֽבְשָׁכְבְּךָ֖ <S%H7901><s%> when thou liest וּבְקוּמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6965><s%> down and when thou risest up

וּכְתַבְתָּ֛ם <S%H3789><s%> And thou shalt write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מְזוּז֥וֹת <S%H4201><s%> them upon the door posts בֵּיתֶ֖ךָ <S%H1004><s%> of thine house וּבִשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8179><s%> and upon thy gates

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <S%H3320><s%> be able to stand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> There shall no man בִּפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> before פַּחְדְּכֶ֨ם <S%H6343><s%> the fear וּמֽוֹרַאֲכֶ֜ם <S%H4172><s%> of you and the dread יִתֵּ֣ן ׀ <S%H5414><s%> shall lay יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> you [for] the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H430><s%> your God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> of you upon כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> all the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּדְרְכוּ־ <S%H1869><s%> that ye shall tread בָ֔הּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> upon as he hath said לָכֶֽם׃ ס
